definitions.definition: To drive dangerously close behind another vehicle .
examples: That idiot has been tailgating me for the last five minutes.

definitions.definition: To follow another person through access control on their access, rather than on one’s own credentials , especially when entering a door controlled by a card reader .
To privately purchase or sell a security immediately after trading in the same security for a client.

main_definition: ( automotive , intransitive , transitive ) To drive dangerously close behind another vehicle .
secondary_definitions: To follow another person through access control on their access, rather than on one’s own credentials , especially when entering a door controlled by a card reader .
( finance , of a broker ) To privately purchase or sell a security immediately after trading in the same security for a client.
( US , intransitive ) To have a tailgate party .
